title: Baseus Blade 100W Power Bank Review: Charge all the things
content:
Portable batteries have always been helpful, but as more (and larger) devices migrate to the USB Power Delivery charging standard, batteries have become even more invaluable for travel and backup. Power banks with a high enough charge rate can now be used with many modern laptops, in addition to the usual mix of tablets, smartphones,

The post Baseus Blade 100W Power Bank Review: Charge all the things appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Baseus Blade 100W power bank promises to be the only portable charger that you need to bring in your bag. Check our review!
